settings.account.referAFriend.descriptio: Share Nyghtlight with furriends and get pawsome rewards like a kitty badge, NCP, and XP for their purr-egistration!
settings.account.dangerousZone.descripti: You can request your account to be meowved. We will manually review it and delete your account within a meowth. Your account and all related data will be deleted.

settings.customization.autoplayProfileMu: Automatically play meowsic on all profiles
settings.customization.animatedFullscree: If disabled, will convert animated banners to static pictures (can affect purrformance)
settings.privacy.description: Manage what other cats can see about you
settings.privacy.likedPosts.description: Other cats can see posts you've purred on your profile
Let's you choose the default option for paw-visibility
item.profileMusic.description: Make all other cats listen to the bop you caught at your human's Café!
